product_name: Granite Gear Traditional Canoe Food Pack
long_description: This deep canoe pack can be loaded up with lots of food, yet it's small enough that it won't become too heavy to carry. Pack refines the age-old portage pack design with an ergonomically cut harness system, sternum strap, arched lid and drawcord overflow. Updated design is now built with Cordura(R) nylon--it's every bit as strong as former material but much lighter. Ballistic nylon bottom offers excellent durability, no matter where you set pack. Padded hipbelt increases stability and comfort.
short_description: This deep canoe pack can be loaded up with lots of food, yet it's small enough that it won't become too heavy to carry.
